name: Fleet Series - Aqua Blue Runner
description: Advanced health shoe with Terahertz technology inside. Features advanced cushioning system, breathable mesh upper, and ergonomic support for all-day comfort. Perfect for walking and daily wellness activities.

name: Fleet Series - Sunset Orange Sport
description: High-performance health shoe with Terahertz technology. Designed for active lifestyles with superior cushioning and lightweight construction. Step up your health with every stride.

name: Fleet Series - Pink Gradient Comfort
description: Stylish health shoe featuring Terahertz technology with beautiful gradient design. Combines fashion with wellness for complete foot health and comfort throughout the day.

name: Fleet Series - Peach Pearl Premium
description: Premium health footwear with Terahertz technology. Advanced cushioning system and breathable mesh design ensure maximum comfort and health benefits for your feet.

name: Wellness Sneaker - Classic White
description: Premium wellness sneakers designed for everyday comfort and style. Features ultra-light sole, breathable material, and ergonomic design for all-day wear.

name: Wellness Sneaker - Urban Black
description: Stylish urban sneakers with health-focused design. Perfect blend of fashion and function with superior comfort and support for active lifestyles.

name: Wellness Sneaker - Sport Gray
description: High-performance wellness sneakers for sports and active wear. Combines comfort technology with athletic design for optimal foot health.

name: Wellness Sneaker - Navy Blue
description: Classic navy sneakers with modern wellness features. Perfect for casual wear while maintaining foot health and comfort throughout the day.

name: Magnetic Therapy Insoles
description: Premium magnetic therapy insoles with foot massage function. Compatible with all Fleet Series and Sneaker products. Features ultra-light sole and breathable material for enhanced wellness.

name: Shoe Care Kit
description: Complete care kit for your health shoes. Includes premium cleaner, protector spray, and microfiber cloth to keep your shoes in perfect condition.

name: Compression Wellness Socks
description: High-performance compression socks designed to complement your wellness footwear. Improves blood circulation and reduces fatigue during extended wear.

name: Ace#1 Gift Card
description: Give the gift of health and comfort! Ace#1 gift card can be used towards any product in our store. Perfect for friends and family who value wellness.
